name: Check Your Own Sentiment & COVID India Tracker

format:
Twitter Sentiment Analysis
IBM HACK CHALLENGE 2020


This is your one stop solution for obtaining the Tweet Analysis in real time!
You have access to the Sentiment analysis regarding COVID-19 and the government lockdown in the next tabs.
Get the real time analysis in a graphical way in the Live Analysis tab.
You will be able to view Pie charts and Bar graphs giving you the best insights on the sentiment analysis.
The live analysis will be shown as a Line graph.




Team name - CodePlay
Sanket Jangale
Kunal Kotkar
Manoj Ayyappan
Shreyas Udupa
College : VESIT, Mumbai

name: Twitter Node Comment
info: Please Enable the Twitter Node and timestamp.

name: Comment for Background
info: if the background color changes to "White", go to "Angular", change "Background" to "Light-Blue" and "Light/Dark" to "Dark".
